spec_data.Name: perl-mime-construct
spec_data.Description:
mime-construct constructs and (by default) mails MIME messages.
It is entirely driven from the command line, it is designed to be used
by other programs, or people who act like programs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:50:55 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Construct/send MIME messages from the command line
